title: Ohms law - current with 3x R and one-half Delta-V

content.question: A resistor has a current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math> when it is connected to a battery. A second resistor with three times the resistance of the first resistor is connected to a second battery that has half the potential difference of the first battery. What is the current in the second resistor?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
